name: Ideogram V3 Remix Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Tool for editing images using the Ideogram V3 Remix model via the kie.ai API. Can generate up to 4 images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025) per image: $0.0175 for Turbo, 7 $0.035 for Balanced, or $0.05 for Quality.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
